text:
2024.07.08
신고/차단
현재 슬라이드01/전체 슬라이드01
별점 5점 중 5점 AYj*******
색상:BK / 사이즈:110
완전 마음에 쏙드네요 금액도 세일해서 마음에들고 디자인도 깔끔하고 가벼워서 잘착용할껏같아요 배송도 24시간안에 도착해서 넘 좋으네요~~다른 색상으로도 또 구매해야겠어요~~
2024.03.13
신고/차단
현재 슬라이드01/전체 슬라이드01
별점 5점 중 5점 tos*******
색상:YG / 사이즈:100
신체스펙 175_ 75인 보통체형입니다 XL주문했다가 팔기장이 너무길고 품이 너무커서 L로 교환했더니 딱맞네요 (운동좋아해서 상하체발달형) 이너로 기모후드입어도 소화가능 완전오버핏으로 입을거면 XL도 추천 스노우픽 갬성을 잘 녹인 경패이니 고민말고 사도될듯 재질도 사각사각한데 보온성도 좋음

trans:
2024.07.08
Report/Block
Current Slide: 01 / Total Slides: 01
Rating 5 out of 5 AYj*******
Color: BK / Size: 110
I absolutely love it! The price was discounted, which is great, and the design is clean and lightweight perfect for regular use. The delivery was super fast, arriving within 24 hours, which was amazing~~ I’m planning to buy it in other colors as well~~
2024.03.13
Report/Block
Current Slide: 01 / Total Slides: 01
Rating 5 out of 5 tos*******
Color: YG / Size: 100
Height 175 cm, weight 75 kg, average build. Initially ordered XL, but the sleeves were too long and the fit too loose. Exchanged for L, and it fits perfectly. (I enjoy working out, so I have a well-developed upper and lower body.) Works well even with a fleece hoodie underneath. If you prefer an oversized fit, XL is still a good choice. The jacket embodies the Snow Peak aesthetic beautifully—no need to hesitate. The material feels crisp and offers great insulation.
